page.title: 15 FEAST WEEK
page.content: Village Feast Week holds something for everyone. This year, after a Family Barbecue on the first Saturday evening, many teams entered themselves for "It's a Knockout" on the Sunday, when fun and friendship were the order of the day. Monday was Film Night, and the W.I.Exhibition and Car Treasure Hunt provided an enjoyable Tuesday Evening. Mini and Youth Club Discos, a Sponsored Bike Ride and an Art & Craft Exhibition were followed on the Friday Evening by a concert at St. Andrew's Church, when local musical talent was brought together. The final day of Feast Week is known as Gala Day, when the Playing Field comes alive with games, raffles, competitions, Go-Kart racing, pony rides and Displays. The P.T.A. Barn Dance traditionally ends the week.
